name: Robo Runner (Jago1996)
description:
WARNING: If your fps(bottom left) is around 30 I can't promise it'll be beatable. I beat it one 60 fps.

FIRST PERSON TO FINISH THIS GAME WITH VIDEO PROOF GETS PUT IN THE DESCRIPTION HERE!!!

Space - Jump

F - Toggle Gravity Direction

This is a difficult game. If you beat it I'll be pretty happy about that. Some of the hit-boxes i noticed were different from the unity runtime. Which was odd. but i managed to beat it still in the web-player.

First level is completed. The other two house the alternate songs.

PROCESS
I spent a day one the 3 songs.

Originally a shooting system was in place but i had to cut it for time.

I'm really proud how this turned out. I'm learning so much with these jams. I'm happy to be here.

BUGS
Once again there is some bugs that appeared after testing this webGL version. 

-Pausing doesn't stop the character for an odd reason. Just reset the level from there.
